title: Volunteers
subtitle: From canteen shifts to coaching and ground setup — our volunteers power every match day.
extended: From dawn setup to pack-down, our canteen crew, coaches, managers and ground marshals keep the club humming. If you can spare an hour, we’ll find a job that fits — thank you, legends.

title: NRL Stage
subtitle: Magpies juniors stepping out on NRL game day — an unforgettable taste of the big stage.
extended: A moment they’ll never forget: running out under the lights, hearing the crowd and repping the black and white on NRL game day. Huge smiles, bigger memories.

title: Run DIPG Amber day
subtitle: Running with purpose — fundraising, teamwork, and community spirit in every kilometre.
extended: Magpies on the move for a great cause. Families, sponsors and mates chip in as our runners clock up the kilometres to raise vital funds for kids in need.

title: First All Girls Team
subtitle: Dudley proudly boasts the first all-girls team in the Hunter, paving the way for future generations.
extended: A milestone for our club and the region — girls leading from the front and inspiring the next wave of Magpies to give league a go.

title: 50 Seasons Strong
subtitle: 1970 → 2020: celebrating life members, long-serving volunteers, and multi-generation Magpies.
extended: Half a century of black-and-white pride. Stories, photos and jerseys that tell the tale of a community club built on effort, respect and friendships.
